statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE vehicle_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE acceleration > 5.0;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_level FROM vehicle_performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE speed >= 100 AND battery_level < 30;
SELECT acceleration, speed FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE acceleration > 5.0 ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, acceleration, battery_level FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE speed < 50.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, battery_level FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE acceleration > 2.0 AND battery_level < 80.0 ORDER BY battery_level DESC, speed ASC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE acceleration > 4.0 AND battery_level > 50.0 ORDER BY acceleration DESC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 6
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_performance_data WHERE acceleration < 2.0 AND battery_level > 70.0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC, battery_level DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT * FROM VehicleData;
SELECT vehicle_id, acceleration, speed FROM VehicleData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, temperature FROM VehicleData WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, description FROM MaintenanceData ORDER BY maintenance_date;
SELECT * FROM VehicleData WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, acceleration, speed FROM VehicleData WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY acceleration ASC
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, temperature FROM VehicleData WHERE acceleration < 0 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_type = 'Oil Change' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, description FROM MaintenanceData WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE mileage > 10000;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT MAX(data_value) FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'pressure';
SELECT vehicle_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, mileage FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT sensor_type, data_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE vehicle_id = 3
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY data_value DESC
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_details FROM maintenance_log WHERE vehicle_id = 5
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, temperature FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, battery_level FROM vehicle_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, sensor_reading FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, efficiency_rating FROM energy_efficiency WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, temperature FROM vehicle_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND battery_level > 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM vehicle_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_reading, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY sensor_reading DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT e.vehicle_id, e.efficiency_rating, m.event_type FROM energy_efficiency e JOIN maintenance_events m ON e.vehicle_id = m.vehicle_id WHERE e.report_generated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_value < 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Vehicle;
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, scheduled_date, completed FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT vehicle_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 ORDER BY vehicle_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, efficiency_value, timestamp FROM EnergyEfficiency WHERE efficiency_value > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
